title: Amimenu 2.0
lastlocation: Do you like to get your last location search?
clickandgo: Click on the Continue button below to get started.
navigatecontinue: Navigate to your desired location and click on the map to drop a marker and submit your information.
exitoexplain: You should receive an email shortly with instructions on how to edit your information.
thanksjoin: Thanks for joining and help us to be update!
touchcity: Touch on a city on map to search with radius
